segments.text: The trouble is not that . It is that he may suddenly remember something I promised him a couple of weeks ago , out of a clear blue sky . Then he complains that I have gone back on my words .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does he do that with his Dad ? I mean , does he complain things to his father ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He never does , and in fact , he seldom communicates with him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But didn â€™ t you say that his Dad takes him under his wings ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I did . He only takes side with him . He seldom asks what Dick is doing .
segments.speaker: S1
